title: [Gameplay] Vel'koz Auto-Attack Animation and Skillshot invulnerability

embed.description: His Auto-attack animation is bugged and skill shots occasionally go through him.

body:
You can mute the video if you prefer. Just talking with a friend while playing.

I was playing a team builder game with a friend, pick Vel'koz mid. Went to lane, started to auto-attack and then my character would freeze in a certain position. Ziggs through his bombs at me and it would occasionally miss as well. The video has everything that seems to be bugged.

replies.body:
Hey Trifight,

Thanks for the report! We're in the process of looking into why he's t-posing during some animations.

I've seen the suggestion that maybe Illaoi being in game has something to do with it: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/fuq2bAOV-velkoz-model-freezes-with-illaoi-in-game

So maybe see if there's something going wrong there?
Thanks for the lead - we'll check it out!

I've seen this shit in-game and it's funny.

Also, What Avenged Sevenfold song was that? Is it a new one or an old one I just can't remember?
I believe its City of Evil.
Someone in another thread said It  happens when illaoi is in the game with Vel'koz.
